entities.name: Included Files List
entities.content:
Path | Function/Description |
------|---------------------|
`/common/page.txt` | Basic page settings |
`/common/taglib.txt` | Tag library declarations |
`/common/doctype.txt` | DOCTYPE declaration |
`/common/meta.txt` | Meta tags and SEO |
`/contract/script.txt` | Common JavaScript for contract module |
`/contract/style.txt` | Common CSS for contract module |
`/contract/yuusyou/keiyakuNewtmp/kihon/body.jsp` | Main content of the screen |

---

entities.name: Modal Dialogs
entities.content:
| File/URL | Function |
|---------- |---------|
| `/dsmart/contract/ukeoi/keiyakuNewtmp/keiriRegisterKakuninFrame.jsp` | Accounting registration confirmation |
| `/dsmart/contract/ukeoi/keiyakuNewtmp/keiriNoSet.jsp` | Accounting number settings |
| `/contract/yuusyou/shijisyoChangeFrame.do` | Instruction sheet change |

---

entities.name: Block Summary Table (Screen Components)
entities.content:
| Block | Path (if applicable) | Function/Content | |-------|--------------|------------------| | EH003 | `/contract/blockList/refer/EH003.jsp` | Error message display | | CH01 | `/contract/blockList/register/CH01.jsp` | Header card, basic contract information | | JH08 | `/contract/blockList/register/JH08.jsp` | Action buttons (save, add, ...) | | J0001_1 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0001_1.jsp` | Basic contract information | | J0002_1 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0002_1.jsp` | Contract details | | C0001 | `/contract/blockList/register/C0001.jsp` | Construction information | | B0031 | `/contract/blockList/register/B0031.jsp` | Customer information | | C0007 | `/contract/blockList/register/C0007.jsp` | Sales information (editable) | | C0004 | `/contract/blockList/refer/C0004.jsp` | Sales information (read-only) | | E0001 | `/contract/blockList/register/E0001.jsp` | Customer list | | J0084 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0084.jsp`
`/contract/blockList/refer/J0084.jsp` | Sales status | | J0088 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0088.jsp` | After-service information | | J0092 | `/contract/blockList/register/J0092.jsp` | Technician assignment | | Cancel/Update | `/contract/cancelUpdateButton.txt` | Cancel/Update buttons at the end of the form | ---

entities.name: Hidden Fields
entities.content: - (There may be other hidden fields from the include file `/contract/contractHidden.txt`)
